name: 5 Nights at Sonic's Fan Game Hard Mode
name_original: 5 Nights at Sonic's Fan Game Hard Mode
description:
Click the bar on the bottom right to open up your cameras

Click on the button in your office to open/close your door

To keep the music box winded up, go to CAM 6 and keep clicking on the button to wind the music box. (This may cause the project to run slower)

________________________________________________________________________________

Thanks for Scott Cowthon #Thankyouscott

and TheCyVap for making an inside joke using Flipnote Studios and DSI to make 5 Nights at Sonic's

and this game was ported from an original creator on scratch named sorewashington

go check him out!

https://scratch.mit.edu/users/sorewashington/

update 1 - Added more crops like posters and a doll on a desk
